title: The construction shall be confined to 10% of the plot and the remaining plot (excluding areas required for parking, roads etc
clause_text: The construction shall be confined to 10% of the plot and the remaining plot (excluding areas required for parking, roads etc.) shall be planted with trees at the rate of at least 500 trees per ha.
section: Development of Cinema and TV Film production ,
